text: @DruckerPhilip .@OregonGovBrown @GovInslee @GavinNewsom have been rock stars!  All are focused on #science & #safety, not on #politics. If the #westcoast survives it’s because of them & not #FederalGovernment. #CA #WA #OR #COVID19
